channel.title: Teaching/Talks on The Quiescent Current
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching/Talks on The Quiescent Current

item.title: Game Framework for C++ Practicum
item.description: For this year’s C++ practicum, we are going to build a small game engine. I’m keeping the code on bitbucket: http://bitbucket.org/jwright/gamecomponents Join us, or fork the code and make your own design. I look forward to seeing how this progresses.

item.title: Game Framework for C++ Practicum
item.description: For this year’s C++ practicum, we are going to build a small game engine. I’m keeping the code on bitbucket: http://bitbucket.org/jwright/gamecomponents Join us, or fork the code and make your own design. I look forward to seeing how this progresses.
